---
title: "EHR Text Mining"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)

# Simulate EHR notes
ehr_notes <- tibble(
  id = 1:5,
  text = c("Patient has diabetes and hypertension.",
           "No history of smoking. Normal vitals.",
           "Severe asthma attack. Prescribed steroids.",
           "High cholesterol, diabetes management ongoing.",
           "Mild depression, follow-up in 2 weeks.")
)

tokens <- ehr_notes %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

tokens
```
